title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather functional (user stories, use cases) and non-functional requirements (performance, scalability, security), create a prioritized list, analyze their feasibility and impact for the MultilingualMasteryIa project. This task also includes researching and documenting best practices in requirement gathering for AI-powered translation systems, and breaking down complex requirements into manageable tasks. Additionally, perform preliminary research on available AI and machine learning libraries and tools that could be utilized in this project.

title: System Design
description: Design the architecture and system flow for MultilingualMasteryIa, including data storage, API design, and user interfaces.

title: Backend Development (1 of N)
description: Develop the backend services for MultilingualMasteryIa, including APIs, data processing, and integration with external translation services.

title: Frontend Development (1 of N)
description: Design and implement the user interfaces for MultilingualMasteryIa, ensuring responsiveness and accessibility.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design the database schema for MultilingualMasteryIa and implement it using appropriate SQL or NoSQL technologies.

title: DevOps and Infrastructure Setup
description: Set up the development, testing, and production environments for MultilingualMasteryIa using cloud services or on-premise solutions.

title: Integration Testing
description: Perform integration tests to ensure that the various components of MultilingualMasteryIa work together seamlessly.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a thorough security audit on MultilingualMasteryIa to identify potential vulnerabilities and implement appropriate mitigations.

title: Documentation
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation for MultilingualMasteryIa, including API references and user guides.
